name: Anomaly Detection
desc: Developed an advanced anomaly detection techniques on 100K+ mobile money transactions, achieving 99% accuracy and an AUC of 0.925 through robust machine learning models.

name: Stduent Dropout Prediction.
desc: Created a predictive model in R to identify factors leading to student dropout, considering variables like age, gender, tuition fees, and course selection.

name: IPL Analysis using Power BI
desc: Designed an interactive Power BI dashboard to visualize performance trends across 15 seasons, highlighting key player statistics and utilizing advanced data transformation techniques to merge over 15,000 rows of data for deeper insights.
